description: Seventh Son Publishing has launched a Kickstarter campaign for its new tabletop roleplaying game (TTRPG), SAKE (Sorcerers, Adventures, Kings, and Economics). This game combines elements of strategy with fantasy roleplaying, offering players a diverse range of gameplay experiences. The Kickstarter campaign, aiming for a $10,600 goal has 37 days remaining until its conclusion on May …
title: Seventh Son Publishing Introduces SAKE TTRPG on Kickstarter

description: Monster Fight Club has announced an expansion for their Cyberpunk RED: Combat Zone tabletop game titled Cyberpunk Edgerunners: Combat Zone. This expansion is inspired by the Netflix series Cyberpunk Edgerunners, developed in collaboration between CD Projekt Red and Studio Trigger. The expansion introduces characters from the series, like Maine, David, Lucy, and Rebecca, allowing players …
title: Monster Fight Club Announces New Expansion: Cyberpunk Edgerunners: Combat Zone

description: Gamelyn Games has unveiled “Tiny Epic Game of Thrones,” a strategy game inspired by the epic saga of Westeros, now live on Kickstarter. With 21 days remaining until the campaign concludes on May 1, the project has already surpassed its funding goal, raising over US$ 243,527 from its US$ 60,000 target, thanks to the backing …
title: Visit the World of Westeros with “Tiny Epic Game of Thrones” Now on Kickstarter
